hero.title: QR sticker that can <accent>save lives</accent>
hero.descriptionOne: In a critical moment, every second matters — ScanMe helps medics act faster.
hero.descriptionTwo: Medical QR sticker is your personal lifesaving code. It instantly provides medics or rescuers with important information: blood type, allergies, chronic conditions, or emergency contacts

about.title: what is <accent>scan me</accent> and our idea
about.descriptionOne: ScanMe is an initiative that unites people who care about others' fate. The project's goal is to help when every second matters.
about.descriptionTwo: The ScanMe QR code instantly provides medics or rescuers with key information about a person — even if they cannot speak.

team.title: <accent>team</accent> of our project
team.description: We are united by one goal — to make the world safer. Each of us contributes to creating a system that can save lives.

mission.title: We strive for everyone — athletes, children, or elderly people — to feel safe in any conditions.
mission.description: Saving lives by providing quick access to information when it matters most.

howItWorks.title: How the <accent>Scan Me</accent> system works
howItWorks.descriptionOne: A simple algorithm that can save lives.

steps.valueOne: Create a personal profile and fill out a short medical questionnaire. It takes less than two minutes.
steps.valueTwo: We will prepare a unique sticker or bracelet with your personal code for you.
steps.valueThree: Attach it to a helmet, protective clothing, bracelet, or other visible place — so rescuers can easily find it.
steps.valueFour: When scanned, the system will instantly display your medical data and notify the contact specified for emergencies.

howItWorks.subtitle: Ready to take care of your safety?
howItWorks.descriptionTwo: Your safety is in your hands. A small sticker can save a priceless life.

whyUs.title: Why choose <accent>Scan Me</accent>
whyUs.description: We created ScanMe to make help faster and life safer. It's a simple solution that can save in a critical moment.

advantages.descriptionOne: Everything you need to know about yourself — in a QR code: contacts, medical data, allergies, blood type. Rescuers will get the needed information in seconds.
advantages.descriptionTwo:
Just scan the QR with your smartphone camera.

No registrations, downloads, or setup.
advantages.descriptionThree:
Your data is stored in a secure environment. Access is only via QR code.

You decide what to show.
advantages.descriptionFour: ScanMe is available as bracelets and stickers — choose what suits you best.
advantages.descriptionFive:
Resistant to water, dirt, and UV.

Won't fade even after active training or rain.
advantages.descriptionSix: Athletes, children, elderly people — anyone can wear ScanMe and feel confident about their safety.

faq.title:
frequently asked 
<accent>questions</accent>
faq.description: We've collected answers to the most common questions to help you better understand how ScanMe works.

list.answerOne:
After registration, you receive a personal QR code containing essential medical information.
In case of an emergency, rescuers can scan the code and instantly get the data needed to provide assistance.
list.questionTwo: Do I need to install an app?
list.answerTwo:
No. ScanMe doesn't require downloading any apps.
A smartphone camera is enough to scan the code.
list.questionThree: Is it safe to store my data?
list.answerThree:
Yes. All your data is stored in a secure environment.
Access is only possible through your unique QR code.
list.questionFour: Where can I place the sticker or bracelet?
list.answerFour: You can attach the QR to a helmet, clothing, phone, bracelet, or other convenient place where rescuers can easily spot it.
list.questionFive: Who is Scan Me suitable for?
list.answerFive: ScanMe is suitable for everyone: athletes, children, elderly people — anyone can use it for their safety.
list.answerSix: Simply click the "Order" button on our website, fill out a short form, and we will make your personal QR set.
